wikipedia_page.main: Tom Albert W. "Codger" Johnson (born c. 1893, Cardiff, died 6 May 1948, Cardiff) was a Wales international rugby union player. He captained the Wales national rugby union team on one occasion in 1925. Johnson played his club rugby for Cardiff RFC captaining the team during the 1924/25 season.
